About Me

Hello! I'm Oleksandr, I'm 23 years old. I reside in Kyiv city. Currently, I work in the finance department of Zakaz.ua company. In my free time from work, I engage in self-improvement, enjoy taking walks around the city, and going on road trips. I have an active mindset, I'm positive, sociable, and goal-oriented. I aspire to pursue a career in web development.
